    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_290</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Función logarítmica</string>
            <string language="en">Logarithmic function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Logarithmische Funktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonction logarithmique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Função logarítmica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzione logaritmica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογαριθμική λειτουργία</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de función logarítmica. Se estudian sus propiedades gráficas relacionadas con el concepto de logaritmo como operación inversa de la potenciación.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of logarithmic function. It studies the graphical properties of logarithms regarding these functions as the inverse of power functions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">decimal</string>
            <string language="en">common</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inversa</string>
            <string language="en">inverse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">logaritmo</string>
            <string language="en">logarithm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">potencia</string>
            <string language="en">power</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">neperiano</string>
            <string language="en">natural</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der logarithmischen Funktion zu erklären. 
Sie studiert die graphischen Eigenschaften der Logarithmen 
betreffend sind diese Funktionen als das Gegenteil der Energie 
Funktionen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de la fonction logarithmique. 
Elle étudie les propriétés graphiques des logarithmes 
concernant ces fonctions comme inverse des fonctions de puissance.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito da função logarítmica. Estuda as propriedades 
gráficas dos logarítmos a respeito destas funções como o inverse 
de funções da potência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto della funzione logaritmica. Studia le 
proprietà grafiche dei logaritmi per quanto riguarda queste funzioni 
come l'inverso delle funzioni di potenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της λογαριθμικής λειτουργίας. 
Μελετά τις γραφικές ιδιότητες των λογαρίθμων σχετικά με 
αυτές τις λειτουργίες καθώς το αντίστροφο της δύναμης 
λειτουργεί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geläufig</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">umgekehrt</string>
          </keyword>
